00036 RainbruRPG::Server::ConfigDialog::
00037 ConfigDialog(ServerConfiguration* sc, QWidget* parent)
00038   : QDialog(parent)
00039 {
00040   this->setMinimumWidth(400);
00041   this->setMinimumHeight(300);
00042   this->setWindowTitle(tr("Server configuration"));
00043   this->serverConfig=sc;
00044 
00045   // The root layout
00046   QVBoxLayout *vb1=new QVBoxLayout(this);
00047 
00048   // The server name
00049   QHBoxLayout *nameLayout=new QHBoxLayout();
00050   vb1->addLayout(nameLayout);
00051   QLabel* nameLabel=new QLabel(tr("Server name"),this);
00052   leName=new QLineEdit(this);
00053   leName->setToolTip(tr("The server public name"));
00054   nameLayout->addWidget(nameLabel);
00055   nameLayout->addWidget(leName);
00056 
00057   // The server description
00058   QLabel* descLabel=new QLabel(tr("Server description :"),this);
00059   vb1->addWidget(descLabel);
00060   teDesc=new QTextEdit(this);
00061   teDesc->setToolTip(tr("The server's multiline description"));
00062   vb1->addWidget(teDesc);
00063 
00064   // TechNote info
00065   showTechNote=new QLabel(this);
00066   showTechNote->setToolTip(tr("Is the technical note contains text"));
00067   vb1->addWidget(showTechNote);
00068 
00069 
00070   // The group boxes
00071   QHBoxLayout *boxesLayout=new QHBoxLayout();
00072   vb1->addLayout(boxesLayout);
00073   QGroupBox* modeGroup=new QGroupBox(tr("Server modes"), this);
00074   QGroupBox* optsGroup=new QGroupBox(tr("Server options"), this);
00075   boxesLayout->addWidget(modeGroup);
00076   boxesLayout->addWidget(optsGroup);
00077 
00078   // Server's modes
00079   QVBoxLayout *vbModes=new QVBoxLayout();
00080   modeGroup->setLayout(vbModes);
00081   cbPlay=new QCheckBox(tr("Player"), this);
00082   cbPlay->setToolTip(tr("This server accepts client connections for playing"));
00083   vbModes->addWidget(cbPlay);
00084   cbEdit=new QCheckBox(tr("Editor"), this);
00085   cbEdit->setToolTip(tr("This server accepts editor connections"));
00086   vbModes->addWidget(cbEdit);
00087   cbFlood=new QCheckBox(tr("Flooder"), this);
00088   cbFlood->setToolTip(tr("This server accepts netflooder connections"));
00089   vbModes->addWidget(cbFlood);
00090 
00091   // Server's options
00092   QGridLayout *glOpts=new QGridLayout();
00093   optsGroup->setLayout(glOpts);
00094   QLabel* labIp=new QLabel(tr("IP adress"), this);
00095   glOpts->addWidget(labIp, 0, 0);
00096   leIp=new QLineEdit(this);
00097   glOpts->addWidget(leIp, 0, 1);
00098   leIp->setToolTip(tr("The IP adress to access this server"));
00099   QLabel* labPort=new QLabel(tr("Port"), this);
00100   glOpts->addWidget(labPort, 1, 0);
00101   sbPort=new QSpinBox(this);
00102   sbPort->setToolTip(tr("The listening port"));
00103   sbPort->setMaximum(0xFFFF);
00104   sbPort->setValue(DEFAULT_SERVER_PORT);
00105   glOpts->addWidget(sbPort, 1, 1);
00106   QLabel* labCli=new QLabel(tr("Max client"), this);
00107   glOpts->addWidget(labCli, 2, 0);
00108   sbCli=new QSpinBox(this);
00109   sbCli->setToolTip(tr("The maximum number of accepted clients"));
00110   sbCli->setMaximum(0xFFFF);
00111   sbCli->setValue(DEFAULT_MAX_CLIENTS);
00112   glOpts->addWidget(sbCli, 2, 1);
00113 
00114 
00115   // The dialog's button
00116   QHBoxLayout *buttonLayout=new QHBoxLayout();
00117   vb1->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00118   buttonLayout->addStretch(100);
00119   QPushButton *btnOk=new QPushButton(tr("OK"), this );
00120   buttonLayout->addWidget(btnOk);
00121 
00122   // Connections
00123   connect (btnOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(controls()));
00124   connect(teDesc, SIGNAL(textChanged()), this, SLOT(descriptionChanged()));
00125   connect(leName, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)), this, 
00126           SLOT(nameChanged()));
00127   connect(cbPlay, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)), this, SLOT(playModeChanged(int)));
00128   connect(cbEdit, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)), this, SLOT(editModeChanged(int)));
00129   connect(cbFlood, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)), this, 
00130           SLOT(floodModeChanged(int)));
00131   connect(sbPort, SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)), this, SLOT(portChanged(int)));
00132   connect(sbCli, SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)), this, SLOT(maxClientChanged(int)));
00133   connect(leIp, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)), this, 
00134           SLOT(ipAddressChanged(const QString&)));
00135 
00136 
00137 
00138   initValues();
00139 }

00162 void RainbruRPG::Server::ConfigDialog::initValues(){
00163   LOGI("Setting initial values");
00164   leName->setText(serverConfig->getName().c_str());
00165   teDesc->setText(serverConfig->getDesc().c_str());
00166   cbPlay->setChecked(serverConfig->getPlayMode());
00167   cbEdit->setChecked(serverConfig->getEditMode());
00168   cbFlood->setChecked(serverConfig->getFloodMode());
00169   sbPort->setValue(serverConfig->getPort());
00170   sbCli->setValue(serverConfig->getMaxClient());
00171   leIp->setText(serverConfig->getIpAdress().c_str());
00172 
00173   QString t(tr("Showing technical note : "));
00174   QString tn(serverConfig->getTechNote().c_str());
00175 
00176   if (tn.isEmpty()){
00177     t.append(tr("No"));
00178   }
00179   else{
00180     t.append(tr("Yes"));
00181   }
00182 
00183   showTechNote->setText(t);
00184 
00185 }

00190 void RainbruRPG::Server::ConfigDialog::descriptionChanged(){
00191   std::string temp(teDesc->toPlainText().toLatin1());
00192   serverConfig->setDesc(temp);
00193 }
00194 
00198 void RainbruRPG::Server::ConfigDialog::nameChanged(){
00199   std::string temp(leName->text().toLatin1());
00200   serverConfig->setName(temp);
00201 }

00208 void RainbruRPG::Server::ConfigDialog::playModeChanged(int i){
00209   if (i==Qt::Checked){
00210     serverConfig->setPlayMode(true);
00211   }
00212   else{
00213     serverConfig->setPlayMode(false);
00214   }
00215 }

00226   else{
00227     serverConfig->setEditMode(false);

00267 void RainbruRPG::Server::ConfigDialog::controls(){
00268   LOGI("Controlling configuration values");
00269 
00270   bool acc=true;
00271 
00272   std::string s=serverConfig->getName();
00273 
00274   // Testing if the name is empty
00275   if (s.empty()){
00276     acc=false;
00277     QMessageBox::warning ( this, tr("Configuration error"), 
00278         tr("The server's name cannot be empty."), QMessageBox::Ok );
00279   }
00280 
00281   if (acc){
00282     accept();
00283   }
00284 }

00291 void RainbruRPG::Server::ConfigDialog::ipAddressChanged(const QString& t){
00292   std::string temp(t.toLatin1());
00293   serverConfig->setIpAdress(temp);
00294 }
